actions.name: create-form-entry
actions.description: Submit a new entry to a Wufoo form with dynamic field selection.

actions.name: find-form
actions.display_name: Find Form by Name or Hash
actions.description: Get details about a Wufoo form including settings, entry counts, and metadata.

actions.name: find-submission-by-field
actions.description: Search for form submissions by field value for deduplication and lookup operations.

actions.name: get-entry-details
actions.description: Get form entries with filtering, sorting, and pagination options.

triggers.name: new_form_entry
triggers.description: Triggers when someone submits a new entry to your Wufoo form.

triggers.name: new_form_created
triggers.description: Triggers when a new form is created in your Wufoo account.
